Name: Manhattan Transfer
Ingredients: 45 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Amaro takes the place of aromatic bitters and adds bitter-sweetness in this riff on a Dry Manhattan .
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2013 by Phil Ward at Mayahuel in New York City, USA. See: Manhattan cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Manhattan Transfer contains 213 calories
